hizbs.text: He amara ka'oma, byapara ki, ami tomaderake da'oyata de'i muktira dike, ara tomara amake da'oyata da'o jahannamera dike.

Tomara amake da'oyata da'o, yate ami allahake asbikara kari ebam tamra sathe sarika kari emana bastuke, yara kona pramana amara kache ne'i. Ami tomaderake da'oyata de'i parakramasali, ksamasila allahara dike.
Ete sandeha ne'i ye, tomara amake yara dike da'oyata da'o, ha'ikale o parakale tara kona da'oyata ne'i! Amadera pratyabartana allahara dike ebam sima langhakarira'i jahannami.
Ami tomaderake ya balachi, tomara ekadina ta smarana karabe. Ami amara byapara allahara kache samarpana karachi. Niscaya bandara allahara drstite rayeche.
Atahpara allaha take tadera cakrantera anista theke raksa karalena ebam phera'una gotrake socaniya ayaba grasa karala.
Sakale o sandhyaya taderake agunera samane pesa kara haya ebam yedina keyamata sanghatita habe, sedina adesa kara habe, phera'una gotrake kathinatara ayabe dakhila kara.
Yakhana tara jahanname paraspara bitarka karabe, atahpara durbalara ahankariderake balabe, amara tomadera anusari chilama. Tomara ekhana jahannamera agunera kichu ansa amadera theke nibrta karabe ki
ahankarira balabe, amara saba'i to jahanname achi. Allaha tamra bandadera phayasala kare diyechena.
Yara jahanname ache, tara jahannamera raksiderake balabe, tomara tomadera palanakartake bala, tini yena amadera theke ekadinera ayaba laghaba kare dena.
Raksira balabe, tomadera kache ki suspasta pramanadisaha tomadera rasula asenani? Tara balabe hamîya. Raksira balabe, tabe tomara'i doya kara. Bastutah kapheradera doya nisphala'i haya.
Ami sahayya karaba rasulaganake o muminaganake parthiba jibane o saksidera dandayamana ha'oyara dibase.
Se dina yalemadera oyara-apatti kona upakare asabe na, tadera jan'ye thakabe abhisapa ebam tadera jan'ye thakabe manda grha.
Niscaya ami musake hedayeta dana karechilama ebam bani isara'ilake kitabera uttaradhikari karechilama.
Bud'dhimanadera jan'ye upadesa o hedayeta sbarupa.
Ata'eba, apani sabara karuna niscaya allahara oyada satya. Apani apanara gonahera jan'ye ksama prarthana karuna ebam sakala-sandhyaya apanara palanakartara prasansasaha pabitrata barnana karuna.

Niscaya yara allahara ayata samparke bitarka kare tadera kache agata kona dalila byatireke, tadera antare ache kebala atnambharita, ya arjane tara saphala habe na. Ata'eba, apani allahara asraya prarthana karuna. Niscaya tini sabakichu sunena, sabakichu dekhena.
Manusera srsti apeksa nabhomandala o bhu-mandalera srsti kathinatara. Kintu adhikansa manusa bojhe na.
Andha o caksusmana samana naya, ara yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare ebam kukarmi. Tomara alpa'i anudhabana kare thaka.
Keyamata abasya'i asabe, ete sandeha ne'i; kinta adhikansa loka bisbasa sthapana kare na.
Tomadera palanakarta balena, tomara amake daka, ami sara deba. Yara amara ebadate ahankara kare tara satbara'i jahanname dakhila habe lanchita haye.

Tini'i allaha yini ratra srsti karechena tomadera bisramera jan'ye ebam dibasake karechena dekhara jan'ye. Niscaya allaha manusera prati anugrahasila, kintu adhikansa manusa krtajnata sbikara kare na.
Tini allaha, tomadera palanakarta, saba kichura srasta. Tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba tomara kothaya bibhranta haccha
emanibhabe taderake bibhranta kara haya, yara allahara ayatasamuhake asbikara kare.

Allaha, prthibike karechena tomadera jan'ye basasthana, akasake karechena chada ebam tini tomaderake akrti dana karechena, atahpara tomadera akrti sundara karechena ebam tini tomaderake dana karechena paricchanna riyika. Tini allaha, tomadera palanakarta. Bisbajagatera palanakarta, allaha barakatamaya.
Tini ciranjiba, tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba, tamke daka tamra khamti ebadatera madhyame. Samasta prasansa bisbajagatera palanakarta allahara.
